description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Resume Extensible Firmware Interface Security Feature Bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37982):

1. Download and apply the following updates relevant to your system version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2 (x64): [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5044280](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044280)
   - For Windows 10 (x64): [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
   - For Windows 10 (32-bit): [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (32-bit): [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (32-bit): [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)

2. Restart your system to ensure the patches take effect. 

**Details**:
- These updates resolve a specific security feature bypass vulnerability within the Windows Resume Extensible Firmware Interface.
- If applicable, apply updates corresponding to the specific build number of your system to ensure compatibility.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a version compatible with the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
